mapper.sql: P_PUID, P_UNIT, P_RENT_LOW, P_RENT_HIGH, P_PICTURE_NO, P_INSTALL_PICTURE_NO, P_MAP, P_MATERIAL_HIGH, P_MATERIAL1, P_MATERIAL2, P_MATERIAL3, P_DENSITY, P_MATERIAL_STANDARD, P_SURFACE_MANAGE, P_TEXTURE_NO, P_MADE_ART, P_SYMMETRIC, P_IMPORTANCE, P_IS_RULE_PART, P_RULE_PART_NO, P_BOM_PUID, P_STATE
mapper.select:
SELECT t1.*,t2.*,t3.*,t4.*,t5.* from HZ_BOM_LINE_RECORD t1
LEFT OUTER JOIN HZ_EPL_BOM_MANAGE t2 on T1.P_PUID = T2.P_BOM_PUID
LEFT OUTER JOIN HZ_EPL_MANAGE t3 on t1.P_PUID=t3.P_BOM_PUID
LEFT OUTER JOIN HZ_PBOM_MAINTAIN_RECORD t4 on t1.P_Puid = t4.P_BOM_PUID
LEFT OUTER JOIN HZ_PBOM_RECORD t5 on t1.P_PUID=t5.P_E_BOM_PUID

SELECT t1.*,t2.*,t3.* from HZ_BOM_LINE_RECORD t1
LEFT OUTER JOIN HZ_EPL_BOM_MANAGE t2 on T1.P_PUID = T2.P_BOM_PUID
LEFT OUTER JOIN HZ_EPL_MANAGE t3 on t1.P_PUID=t3.P_BOM_PUID
mapper.insert: insert into HZ_EPL_MANAGE (P_PUID, P_UNIT, P_RENT_LOW, P_RENT_HIGH, P_PICTURE_NO, P_INSTALL_PICTURE_NO, P_MAP, P_MATERIAL_HIGH, P_MATERIAL1, P_MATERIAL2, P_MATERIAL3, P_DENSITY, P_MATERIAL_STANDARD, P_SURFACE_MANAGE, P_TEXTURE_NO, P_MADE_ART, P_SYMMETRIC, P_IMPORTANCE, P_IS_RULE_PART, P_RULE_PART_NO, P_BOM_PUID, P_STATE) values (#{pPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pRentLow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pRentHigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pPictureNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pInstallPictureNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pMap,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pMaterialHigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pMaterial1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pMaterial2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pMaterial3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pDensity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pMaterialStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pSurfaceManage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pTextureNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pMadeArt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pSymmetric,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pImportance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pIsRulePart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pRulePartNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pBomPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pState,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update HZ_EPL_MANAGE
P_UNIT = #{pUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_RENT_LOW = #{pRentLow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_RENT_HIGH = #{pRentHigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_PICTURE_NO = #{pPictureNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_INSTALL_PICTURE_NO = #{pInstallPictureNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_MAP = #{pMap,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_MATERIAL_HIGH = #{pMaterialHigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_MATERIAL1 = #{pMaterial1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_MATERIAL2 = #{pMaterial2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_MATERIAL3 = #{pMaterial3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_DENSITY = #{pDensity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_MATERIAL_STANDARD = #{pMaterialStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_SURFACE_MANAGE = #{pSurfaceManage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_TEXTURE_NO = #{pTextureNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_MADE_ART = #{pMadeArt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_SYMMETRIC = #{pSymmetric,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_IMPORTANCE = #{pImportance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_IS_RULE_PART = #{pIsRulePart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_RULE_PART_NO = #{pRulePartNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_BOM_PUID = #{pBomPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_STATE = #{pState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where P_PUID = #{pPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update HZ_EPL_MANAGE set P_UNIT = #{pUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_RENT_LOW = #{pRentLow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_RENT_HIGH = #{pRentHigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_PICTURE_NO = #{pPictureNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_INSTALL_PICTURE_NO = #{pInstallPictureNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_MAP = #{pMap,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_MATERIAL_HIGH = #{pMaterialHigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_MATERIAL1 = #{pMaterial1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_MATERIAL2 = #{pMaterial2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_MATERIAL3 = #{pMaterial3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_DENSITY = #{pDensity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_MATERIAL_STANDARD = #{pMaterialStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_SURFACE_MANAGE = #{pSurfaceManage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_TEXTURE_NO = #{pTextureNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_MADE_ART = #{pMadeArt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_SYMMETRIC = #{pSymmetric,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_IMPORTANCE = #{pImportance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_IS_RULE_PART = #{pIsRulePart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_RULE_PART_NO = #{pRulePartNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_BOM_PUID = #{pBomPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_STATE = #{pState,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where P_PUID = #{pPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
